          <title>
            <string language="fr">Mouvement des planètes autour de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Movement of planets around the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Planeten um die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento dos planetas em torno da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento dei pianeti intorno alla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση των πλανητών γύρω από τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de planetas alrededor de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration démontre le mouvement des  planètes si elles se déplacent toutes autour de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the movement of planets if they all move around the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rotation</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bewegung der Planeten, 
wenn alle sie um die Masse umziehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra o movimento dos 
planetas se todos se moverem em torno da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra il movimento dei 
pianeti se tutti si muovono intorno alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τη μετακίνηση των 
πλανητών εάν όλοι κινούνται γύρω από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra el movimiento de 
planetas si todos se mueven alrededor de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
